title: The Captain
description: Love and forgiveness made me whole again but danger is everywhere. My stalker almost had me, but I’m still here to tell the tale. I owe my life to my stepbrothers, who risked everything to save me—their lives, their careers, our blended family. I’m no damsel-in-distress, I’m stronger than that. But someone is determined to destroy me, just when things were starting to go right, just when I’d found the love I’d always needed. Maybe the solution is for us to leave, hoping that my stalker won’t follow. We’ve come too far to ever give up on each other. So one last family celebration and my stepbrothers and I will be gone. I’m under 24/7 surveillance by the military men who hold my heart. I couldn’t ask for better guards. I trust them completely, but I’m terrified that this evil will slip through and ruin the happiest day of my life. It’s time to return to Star Cove for the final installment of the story. Will our heroine survive? Or will the darkness win? this book is the conclusion of a trilogy and ends in a HEA. This is a military stepbrother story where the heroine won’t have to choose between her different love interests. Suitable only for readers aged 18+
author: Melissa Adams
